div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: vid. Nērangs, Recitation Instruction.

Nerangs.ab: rāspīg pad gāh ī frabardārān šawišn ān gyāg kū dast ī hōy ī zōt abāyēd guftan yaϑā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē zōt aϑā ratuš kardan
"The rāspīg has to go to the place of the frabardārān, to the place to the left hand of the zōt, and must say: yaϑā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē. The zōt should answer: aϑā ratuš."
